quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“contract”（合同）的干扰，或词根“tract”（拉）的误导，将“contraction”误理解为“合同”或“牵引”。
quiz_item.sentence: In English grammar class, the teacher emphasized that "isn't" is a common **contraction** of "is not" used in daily conversations.

option.definition: 缩写形式（语言中省略字母的短形式）
收缩；缩小（如肌肉或经济）
